Climate change is coming – fast. We must do more to stop it. I introduced the Climate Risk Disclosure Act to encourage markets to transition from fossil fuels to cleaner energy sources, and reduce the risks of environmental and financial catastrophe. https://www.huffingtonpost.com/entry/elizabeth-warren-climate-disclosure-bill_us_5b9b6381e4b013b097795efb

Incredibly alarming. Denying global warming is a threat to public health, our future, and our planet. 
https://twitter.com/Reuters/status/1049106258509410305 QT @Reuters Temperatures to rise 1.5 degrees Celsius by 2030-2052 without rapid steps: U.N. report https://trib.al/k6mOfum

The good news is that we have the technology to transform our energy system away from fossil fuels. 

The bad news is that Congress and the White House lack the political will to stand up to the fossil fuel industry. Together, you and I will change that. https://www.washingtonpost.com/energy-environment/2018/10/08/world-has-only-years-get-climate-change-under-control-un-scientists-say/?utm_term=.91ac3f8d07cf
